view.block:
<view a:key="{{item.nid||index}}" class="demo-im" data-target="{{`goods0${idx}${index}`}}" onAppear="goodsAppear" onDisappear="goodsDisAppear" style="transition:all 0.5s linear {{index<4?index*120:0}}ms;transform:translateY({{(goods[`goods0${idx}${index}`]=== 'appear'&&activeIndex==idx)?0:100}}rpx);opacity:{{goods[`goods0${idx}${index}`]=== 'appear'?1:0}};width:{{goodsWidth}}rpx;border-radius: {{goodsRadius}}rpx;background-color:{{goodsBg}};marginLeft:{{index==0?0:(goodsWidth<=192?14:18)}}rpx" data-url="{{item.h5Url}}" data-spmd="{{spmd+index}}" data-nid="{{item.nid}}" catchTap="handleDataUrl">
                  
                    
                    
                  
                  <view a:if="{{goodsTitleDis||goodsPriceDis||goodsOldPriceDis||goodsBtnDis||goodsSaleDis}}" class="item-data" style="text-align:{{textAlign}};margin-top:{{goodsWidth<=256?10:12}}rpx;margin-bottom:{{goodsWidth<=256?18:20}}rpx;">
                    <text class="item-title" a:if="{{goodsTitleDis}}" style="color:{{goodsTitleC}};font-size:{{goodsWidth<=256?24:26}}rpx;font-weight:{{goodsTitleW}};height:{{goodsTitleLines*30}}rpx" number-of-lines="{{goodsTitleLines}}">{{itemPic == 2 && itemInfos.gdInfoList[idx][index] &&itemInfos.gdInfoList[idx][index].title ? itemInfos.gdInfoList[idx][index].title :item.title}}
                    
                      
                        
                          <text style="font-size:{{goodsWidth<=256?18:24}}rpx;font-weight:700;">{{goodsPriceQz}}
                          <text style="font-size:{{goodsWidth<=256?28:34}}rpx;font-weight:700;">{{item.priceYuan}}
                          <text style="font-size:{{goodsWidth<=256?18:24}}rpx;font-weight:700;">{{goodsPriceXs?"."+item.priceFen:""}}
                          <text style="font-size:{{goodsWidth<=256?16:20}}rpx;font-weight:700;">{{goodsPriceHz}}
                        
                        
                          <text class="item-oldPrice-y" style="color:{{goodsOldPriceC}};font-size: {{goodsWidth<=256?20:24}}rpx;">￥{{item.reservePrice}}
                        
                      
                      
                        
                      
                    
                    <text class="item-sale" a:if="{{goodsSaleDis&&item.sold30daysQuantity}}" style="color:{{goodsSaleC}};font-size:{{goodsWidth<=256?20:24}}rpx;" number-of-lines="1">已售{{item.sold30daysQuantity}}

<view a:key="{{item.nid||index}}" class="demo-im" style="width:{{goodsWidth}}rpx;border-radius: {{goodsRadius}}rpx;background-color:{{goodsBg}};marginLeft:{{index==0?0:(goodsWidth<=192?14:18)}}rpx" data-url="{{item.h5Url}}" data-spmd="{{spmd+index}}" data-nid="{{item.nid}}" catchTap="handleDataUrl">
                  
                    
                    
                  
                  <view a:if="{{goodsTitleDis||goodsPriceDis||goodsOldPriceDis||goodsBtnDis||goodsSaleDis}}" class="item-data" style="text-align:{{textAlign}};margin-top:{{goodsWidth<=256?10:12}}rpx;margin-bottom:{{goodsWidth<=256?18:20}}rpx;">
                    <text class="item-title" a:if="{{goodsTitleDis}}" style="color:{{goodsTitleC}};font-size:{{goodsWidth<=256?24:26}}rpx;font-weight:{{goodsTitleW}};height:{{goodsTitleLines*30}}rpx" number-of-lines="{{goodsTitleLines}}">{{itemPic == 2 && itemInfos.gdInfoList2[idx][index] &&itemInfos.gdInfoList2[idx][index].title ? itemInfos.gdInfoList2[idx][index].title :item.title}}
                    
                      
                        
                          <text style="font-size:{{goodsWidth<=256?18:24}}rpx;font-weight:700;">{{goodsPriceQz}}
                          <text style="font-size:{{goodsWidth<=256?28:34}}rpx;font-weight:700;">{{item.priceYuan}}

                          <text style="font-size:{{goodsWidth<=256?16:20}}rpx;font-weight:700;">{{goodsPriceHz}}
                        
                        
                          <text class="item-oldPrice-y" style="color:{{goodsOldPriceC}};font-size: {{goodsWidth<=256?20:24}}rpx;">￥{{item.reservePrice}}
                        
                      
                      
                        
                      
                    
                    <text class="item-sale" a:if="{{goodsSaleDis&&item.sold30daysQuantity}}" style="color:{{goodsSaleC}};font-size:{{goodsWidth<=256?20:24}}rpx;" number-of-lines="1">已售{{item.sold30daysQuantity}}
